title: LeaverBuster/Remake
body: Ok so i've had issues with my internet/power in the new house i moved into ended up dcing and things out of games and racked up quite a few leaves, but now its fixed and i was getting back to trying to play and i got on the other day and my computer restarted so i was like ok ill just get back into the game but when i loaded back in my team was doing a remake and now since that happened i have a 20 minute timer before each game so i cant even play on my account. I just think its total crap that 1). you can get a ban timer for remakes and  2). the timer never resets even after a month or so of no leaves or even play.

replies.body:
Let me take a stab at clarifying things on Leaverbuster/Remake. 

 1. Yes, you can get an LPQ (queue timer) for **consistent** disconnections from matches within a short span of time. Regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match, so disconnections are all treated equally by the system.

2. Your standing in the Leaverbuster system decays over time, but requires a consistent trend of *not disconnecting* from matches. Time isn't the only factor, as a player could play sparsely, but if they disconnect every time they play, they'd still be negatively affecting other's gameplay.

Check out our [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) or [/Remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) FAQs for more information. Let me know if you have any questions.
